title: AR-based CLT Applied Curriculum for Understanding 3D Spatial Arrangements in Molecular Geometry

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Chemical Structures and Molecular Bonding Theory
context.additional_context: Social domain-linked education for current professionals, utilizing smartphone-based AR technology for learning.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately visualize and explain the 3D spatial arrangement of molecules using AR technology.
Learners can acquire core concepts of molecular geometry through a Cognitive Load Theory (CLT)-based instructional approach that minimizes cognitive load.
Learners can enhance spatial cognition skills through hand-gesture-based molecular manipulation activities.

resources: CLT (Cognitive Load Theory) Applied Instructional Design Guidelines
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
